Release details, version LTS.464
Patch LTS.464.12 of August 20, 2025
Changes and improvements
Hiding empty folders in the attribute with the
"Multiple objects as a table"
visual was improved.
The display of a string attribute with the "Phone" visual in the object registry was adjusted.
The behavior logic of the
"Quick access toolbar"
widget was adjusted.
The ability to visualize data using the
"Linear chart"
dashboard panel regardless of data volume was debugged.
The task assignment at the start of a business process was debugged.
The algorithm call with
user action
, in the additional parameters of which the object is saved before the algorithm is executed was debugged.
(introduced in release
LTS.463.8
).
The operation of the modal window for entering parameters was stabilized.
The process of deleting a child object instance followed by saving the parent object when using
custom actions
was debugged.
The error display during algorithm compilation was adjusted.
When working with algorithm parameters, the ability to filter values based on the data source was debugged.
In the
login page constructor
, the subheading of the start page component was aligned.
The creation of
user registration profiles
was stabilized.
After
substitution
ends, task return to the original assignee was restored, along with the ability to change the assignee.
The ability to delete rows in the reporting form was stabilized.
The behavior when expanding a collapsed attribute group in a document questionnaire was optimized.
The content display when working in bookmark value comparison mode was fixed.
The display of questionnaire values when updating from a data source was stabilized.
The comment display in the document was stabilized.
The version comparison results display was debugged.
This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.464.8 of August 11, 2025
New features
The user can now flexibly
configure allowed email notifications
for employees.
The extended Kanban board version now supports WIP limits.
A configured Kanban board can now be added as a menu item.
User account parameters were extended: the reason for
user blocking
is now displayed, along with block history.
The new
deleteLdapEntry
function allows deleting entries from the Active Directory service.
Users currently working on a document are now displayed. Cursor highlighting and text selection by other users were added.
When uploading a new document version, the System retains existing text locks and ignores changes made to locks in the file.
Changes and improvements
The hint text in the modal window for adding a new email address to the employee profile was adjusted.
The stability when editing a
primitive object
profile was improved.
Changing the company logo in
SaaS solutions
when using a Community Edition license was restrcited.
The template name display during product installation from the
solution catalog
was fixed.
The license purchase process was improved.
The modal window behavior across the System was stabilized.
The automatic naming of tables/fields was stabilized.
Saving object attributes configured with a
frame
was improved.
The stability when entering attribute values using a configured
input mask
was enhanced.
For the "File" type attribute with the
"Multiple files in table view"
visual, the ability to switch the registry type was implemented.
The operation of
OnChanged events
was stabilized when the object type contains child attributes.
The instance creation process in a folder-enabled registry was fixed.
The
tile registry
loading on open was optimized.
The height configuration for "File" attributes using the
"Image"
visual was stabilized.
The task icon display between web and mobile GreenData apps was unified.
The logic for configuring
object type hierarchy
was improved.
An SQL query creation option for the "Regular expressions for update verification" visual was added. The visual and default registry for object types included in the information security checklist were adjusted.
The deletion of files added via the
"Explorer"
widget was simplified.
The handling of column width/height settings in the
"Financial Reporting"
widget was improved.
The filtering of objects in the registry displayed using the
"Object list"
widget was debugged and optimized.
The date selection via calendar in the
Gantt chart
was improved.
The logic for configuring the
"Control element"
analytical dashboard was improved: value auto-fill algorithm can now return empty or coded object lists.
When configuring columns of the dashboard analytical panel
"Table"
, the formatting algorithms were stabilized, and the display of column names during export was debugged.
The logic for building a
condition tree
when unsaved data is present was improved: earlier operators and conditions are no longer auto-saved as drafts.
The condition tree setup in
Mozilla Firefox
browser was stabilized.
The user task completion process was stabilized.
Data saving in task profile attributes after attaching a file was debugged and stabilized.
The
copyAndSave
function for copying report form data was improved.
The operation of the
attr
function with the "Set value" option for
historical attributes
was debugged.
The attribute list display in modal windows when calling
objectsWithOptions
was updated.
The operation of the
printEDoc
function was debugged.
Saving
data source algorithms
for dashboards was improved.
The contextual object type selection for
"Condition for visual"
algorithms was restored.
The algorithm behavior when comparing values with a
variable attribute
was fixed.
Error warnings now appear when trying to save an invalid algorithm.
A language selection for Telegram bot
message settings
was added.
The ETL data converter can now continue processing other inputs even if some elements of a dynamic structure fail.
The ability to
launch the ETL process by file
was implemented and debugged.
The transfer of
object hierarchies
via updates was fixed.
Filtering by tag on the
update creation
page was added.
The process of writing to the
audit log of attribute value changes
was optimized when
attribute-level permissions
are configured.
The management of
security policies
independently of user administration permissions was improved.
The logic of
user lockout due to inactivity
was corrected: this parameter now takes into account the use of hook tokens.
The application of permission control based on condition trees, which relies on
primitive objects
, was debugged.
The
temporary file cleanup
process was optimized.
The
aggregation of reporting form values
was debugged and stabilized.
The button labels for "Attach to object" in template-based documents were adjusted.
The display of tabulation symbols and underlined list markers was improved.
The footnote addition to selected text was stabilized.
The comment button display when selecting text with
Shift
+ mouse click was fixed.
The version comparison in bookmark mode with comments was stabilized.
Export is now possible even without edit permissions.
The comment text handling was improved.
In documents generated from templates, the handling of bookmarks was debugged, including the ability to copy bookmark text.
The process of creating a new document version was stabilized.
The page format settings in EDoc documents were debugged.
The position of "Mute notifications" icon was changed.
The ability to configure the
transcription service
was debugged.
The info panel link to the GreenData VK social network page:
VK
was updated.
